name: sikka-buya
description: A digital application for displaying and exploring islamic coinage.
author: Severin Opel

scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && pm2 delete all && npm run pm2
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.postinstall:windows: (cd frontend && yarn install) && (cd backend && yarn install) && (cd test && yarn install)
scripts.postinstall:default: (cd frontend && yarn install); (cd backend && yarn install); (cd test && yarn install)
